text:
"Out of an abundance of caution," the @US_FDA and @CDCgov are recommending a "pause in the use of the #JohnsonandJohnson #COVID19 #vaccine, after "6 cases of a rare and severe type of blood clot." 

This is according to Dr. Janet Woodcock, the acting @US_FDA Commissioner. https://t.co/MsH6gzvm4F
